game.name: Panic Delivery
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 캡션 이용 가능, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A horror/comedy co-op game for 4 players: deliver packages in a dystopian world ruled by a ruthless and grotesque society of monsters! Failure is not an option: if the customers don’t kill you, the company will… and another expendable human will take your place.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A horror/comedy co-op game for 4 players: deliver packages in a dystopian world ruled by a ruthless and grotesque society of monsters! Failure is not an option: if the customers don’t kill you, the company will… and another expendable human will take your place.
